thread.title: Jerry Rice angers Atlanta Falcons' fans with rather mild tweet
thread.title_full: Jerry Rice angers Atlanta Falcons' fans with rather mild tweet

author: Bay Area News Group
title: Jerry Rice angers Atlanta Falcons' fans with rather mild tweet
text:
Jerry Rice angers Atlanta Falcons' fans with rather mild tweet Bay Area News Group Posted: 10/16/2015 07:13:12 PM PDT Updated: 10/16/2015 07:13:13 PM PDT Jerry Rice apparently got under the skin of Falcons fans despite a rather mild tweet during Atlanta's loss to the New Orleans Saints Thursday night, according to Yahoo. 
Tweeted Rice, "Mistakes are killing the Falcons!" They certainly were. Atlanta quarterback Matt Ryan was sacked five times, and the Falcons had five fumbles. Three were recovered by New Orleans. 
That didn't stop the angry herd from Atlanta. Many of the responses referred to stickum, which Rice said he never used. "Never used Stickum! Don't blame me for dropped footballs. My work effort speaks for itself. #Goat." 
Beautiful. The hashtag Goat stands for "Greatest of all-time," and who's going to argue with the NFL's all-time leader in catches, yards and touchdowns. Advertisement
